extension.name: Content - MovingText
extension.author: Sakis Terzis
extension.description: This plugin gives you the ability to have sliding text inside your content.Usage: {text=the text you want to use} example {text=I hope you like that plugin}. The moving elements could be styled using the className "movingObj". Avoid using p and br tags.

field.name: mskWidth
field.label: Vissible text Width in px
field.description: The width of the visible mask of the text

field.name: speed
field.label: Speed of Text
field.description: The speed of the text movement

field.name: time
field.label: Movement Interval
field.description: The inteval to in milliseconds to do the movement.
